title: Paul Woebkenberg on Ecosia's regen ag investments
subtitle: Paul Woebkenberg on Ecosia's regen ag investments
summary:
This is a check in interview with Paul Woebkenberg who is leading the Ecosia’s regen ag investments, their € 500K finance fund for regenerative agriculture.
